name: Jamy
description:
Jamy is an incredibly hardcore platformer that doesn't forgive mistakes.

The game's plot involves an incident during lunch in the lab, which resulted in a presumably intelligent creature - Jamy. Try after try, showing unprecedented dexterity and calculation, you have to help him escape from the clutches of the evil scientist, avoiding a variety of traps and obstacles.

Be very attentive and remember: one awkward move and the game will throw you back to the checkpoint.

The game has nice graphics, simple and intuitive controls and real hardcore.
